product.title: Loretta Sky Roman Blind
product.description: Fresh yet cosseting, this loretta sky roman blind reminds us of the warm summer days, gentle waves lapping the sands. And with the metallic twist, this fabric has a sweet twinkle too. The luscious texture of this blind gives your scheme plenty of character, while giving a touch fresh yet cosseting, this loretta sky roman blind reminds us of the warm summer days, gentle waves lapping the sands.
